title: Correction: Iron Regulation of the Major Virulence Factors in the AIDS-Associated Pathogen Cryptococcus neoformans
fullText: There is an error in Fig 2B of the published article: the blots for SIT1 Serotype A and Serotype D are identical. Please view the correct Fig 2 here.
